sheet_title: Title 24 CF-1R Energy Compliance Reports (Building Envelope & Fenestration)
description: Six tiled CF-1R (Certificate of Compliance - Residential Performance Compliance Method) report pages covering building envelope performance, fenestration schedules (window U-factors and SHGC), insulation specifications, and compliance margin summaries. Climate Zone 8, performance compliance method using CBECC-Res.
key_content: Building envelope summary table with component areas and U-factors
Fenestration schedule with window orientations, areas, U-factors, and SHGC values
Compliance margin calculations (heating, cooling, water heating)
VALUE NOT LEGIBLE: specific U-factor and SHGC numeric values (composited at small scale with watermark)
VALUE NOT LEGIBLE: insulation R-values (present but not readable at composited scale)
VALUE NOT LEGIBLE: EDR (Energy Design Rating) values
VALUE NOT LEGIBLE: compliance margin percentages

drawing_zones.content: CF-1R Form: Building envelope summary table (component areas and U-factors)
CF-1R Form: Fenestration detail schedule (windows by orientation, area, U-factor, SHGC)
CF-1R Form: Fenestration continued / whole building summary with compliance checkboxes
CF-1R Form: Building envelope compliance with insulation specifications
CF-1R Form: HVAC system summary and compliance margins
CF-1R Form: Final compliance results with EDR values and pass/fail
Title block: URo Designs, project info, sheet T-1, revision/date column

title_block_address: 1232 N. Jefferson Street Unit A, Placentia, CA 92870
